price: Kandi iyo bitaza kuba ijambo ryaturutse kwa Nyagasani wawe ryabanje (ryo kudahaniraho) ndetse ntihanabeho igihe cyagenwe (cyo guhanwa), byari kuba ihame ko bacirwaho iteka (hano ku isi).
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَكَانَ لِزَامٗا وَأَجَلٞ مُّسَمّٗى

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika lakāna lizāman wa-ajalun musamman
